## Support

If you need help using this project or have general questions, please try the following options:

- Search existing issues to see if your question has already been answered.
- Open a new issue titled `Support: <short description>` describing your question.
  - Include relevant environment details.
  - Clearly describe the expected vs. actual behavior.
- If GitHub Discussions are enabled for this repository, you may also ask questions there.

### Security issues

If you believe you have found a security vulnerability, **do not** open a public issue.
Please follow the instructions in [SECURITY.md](./SECURITY.md).
